## ApiPropertyItem.isOptional property

True if this is an optional property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly isOptional: boolean;
```

## Remarks

For example:

```ts
interface X {
  y: string;   // not optional
  z?: string;  // optional
}

```
